column4: Does anyone know why virtualbox only works under the i386 kernel but if you use that audio breaks?
virtualbox works fine with the 64-bit kernel for me =/
Whats that kernel called? Could I switch to it if i'm running generic now?
there're two different versions of most packages in the Ubuntu repositories, including the -generic kernel. One version is 32-bit, one is 64-bit. You're not supposed to mix them, no.
